title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available
description: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available. Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2 projects, the Open/Close project options are not always available.
EB: Either both Open/Close project options should be available or neither one should be enabled.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Create two projects, P1 and P2. 2. Select project P2. 3. Attempt to close project P2.
